languages.text: "Если бы кто-то из напавших на поместье выжил, быть может, он стал бы источником ценной информации... но вы сделали из них пример в назидание остальным глупцам". {n}Вистенца бросает взгляд на вокс.{/n} "Впрочем, я слышала переговоры стражи о ком-то постороннем на территории. Кроме того, мы до сих пор не раскрыли, кто впустил негодяев в усадьбу — вероятно, этот человек тоже может что-то знать".

traits.locale_text: "Кто-то руководит оборванцами, которые гибнут в таких бессмысленных эскападах, как сегодняшняя. И этот "кто-то" может скрываться где угодно — возможно, даже не на Янусе! В вашем распоряжении — ресурсы и возможности, которых никогда не будет у меня. Один ваш корабль — грозная сила и несравненное подспорье для выслеживания паразитов за пределами моего влияния ".

languages.text: "If any of those who attacked the estate had survived, then perhaps they could have been a valuable source of information... but you made an example of them for the rest of the foolish rabble." {n}Vistenza glances at the vox.{/n} "Incidentally, I did overhear the wardens talking about some kind of stranger in the area. Besides that, we still do not know who let those reprobates into the estate — the person who did it might also know something."
languages.original_text: "Если бы кто-то из напавших на поместье выжил, быть может, он стал бы источником ценной информации... но вы сделали из них пример в назидание остальным глупцам". {n}Вистенца бросает взгляд на вокс.{/n} "Впрочем, я слышала переговоры стражи о ком-то постороннем на территории. Кроме того, мы до сих пор не раскрыли, кто впустил негодяев в усадьбу — вероятно, этот человек тоже может что-то знать".

traits.locale_text: "My guards are crushing the lowly saboteurs across the planet, {name}, but it will be for naught unless their nests are destroyed. Someone is controlling the riffraff who are perishing in thoughtless escapades such as the one we witnessed today, and that someone could be hiding anywhere! You have resources and capabilities at your disposal, the likes of which I could never hope to possess. Your ship alone is a formidable power and an unequaled asset for tracking down criminals beyond the borders of my influence."

"If any of those who attacked the estate had survived, then perhaps they could have been a valuable source of information... but you made an example of them for the rest of the foolish rabble." {n}Vistenza glances at the vox.{/n} "Incidentally, I did overhear the guards talking about some kind of stranger in the area. Besides that, we still do not know who let those reprobates into the estate — the person who did it might also know something".

Besides that, we still do not know who let those reprobates into the estate — the person who did it might also know something."

Besides that, we still do not know who let those reprobates into the estate — the person who did it might also know something."

Besides that, we still do not know who let those reprobates into the estate — the person who did it might also know something."

languages.text: “如果那些袭击庄园的人还有活口的话，或许他们可以成为有价值的信息来源……不过，您已经对那些愚蠢的暴民杀一儆百了。”{n}维丝坦萨瞥了一眼音阵装置。{/n}“顺便一提，我之前听到守卫谈论过这片地区的某个陌生人。除此之外，我们目前还没查出来是谁放那群暴徒进了庄园。如果能找出是谁做的，或许那个人会知道些什么。”
languages.original_text: "If any of those who attacked the estate had survived, then perhaps they could have been a valuable source of information... but you made an example of them for the rest of the foolish rabble." {n}Vistenza glances at the vox.{/n} "Incidentally, I did overhear the wardens talking about some kind of stranger in the area. Besides that, we still do not know who let those reprobates into the estate — the person who did it might also know something."

traits.locale_text: “如果那些袭击庄园的人还有活口的话，或许他们可以成为有价值的信息来源……不过，您已经对那些愚蠢的暴民杀一儆百了。”{n}维丝坦萨瞥了一眼音阵装置。{/n}“顺便一提，我之前听到守卫谈论过这片地区的某个陌生人。除此之外，我们目前还没查出来是谁放那群暴徒进了庄园。如果能找出是谁做的，或许那个人会知道些什么。”

languages.text: «Si alguno de los que atacaron la finca hubiera sobrevivido, tal vez habría podido proporcionarnos algo de información... pero hizo que sirvieran de ejemplo para el resto de la chusma». {n}Vistenza mira el voco.{/n} «Sí he oído a los vigilantes mencionar a una persona desconocida en la zona. Además, tampoco sabemos quién dejó que esos réprobos entraran en mis terrenos. Quienquiera que fuese, también podría saber algo».
languages.original_text: "If any of those who attacked the estate had survived, then perhaps they could have been a valuable source of information... but you made an example of them for the rest of the foolish rabble." {n}Vistenza glances at the vox.{/n} "Incidentally, I did overhear the wardens talking about some kind of stranger in the area. Besides that, we still do not know who let those reprobates into the estate — the person who did it might also know something."

traits.locale_text: «Si alguno de los que atacaron la finca hubiera sobrevivido, tal vez habría podido proporcionarnos algo de información... pero hizo que sirvieran de ejemplo para el resto de la chusma». {n}Vistenza mira el voco.{/n} «Sí he oído a los vigilantes mencionar a una persona desconocida en la zona. Además, tampoco sabemos quién dejó que esos réprobos entraran en mis terrenos. Quienquiera que fuese, también podría saber algo».

languages.text: 「この屋敷を襲撃した者が生きていたなら、きっと貴重な情報源となったのでしょう…ですが、これはこれで、愚かな暴徒の残党にはいい見せしめです」{n}ヴィステンツァはヴォクスを一瞥する。{/n}「偶然ですが、その地域に何やら見慣れない者がいると、ワーデンが話しているのを耳にしました。加えて、あのような堕落したものを屋敷に入れたのが誰なのかも分かっていません。その人物なら何か知っているかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "If any of those who attacked the estate had survived, then perhaps they could have been a valuable source of information... but you made an example of them for the rest of the foolish rabble." {n}Vistenza glances at the vox.{/n} "Incidentally, I did overhear the wardens talking about some kind of stranger in the area. Besides that, we still do not know who let those reprobates into the estate — the person who did it might also know something."

traits.locale_text: 「この屋敷を襲撃した者が生きていたなら、きっと貴重な情報源となったのでしょう…ですが、これはこれで、愚かな暴徒の残党にはいい見せしめです」{n}ヴィステンツァはヴォクスを一瞥する。{/n}「偶然ですが、その地域に何やら見慣れない者がいると、ワーデンが話しているのを耳にしました。加えて、あのような堕落したものを屋敷に入れたのが誰なのかも分かっていません。その人物なら何か知っているかもしれません」

languages.text: "Hätte jemand von den Angreifern auf das Anwesen überlebt, wäre das vielleicht eine wertvolle Informationsquelle gewesen ... aber ihr habt an allen ein Exempel statuiert, für den Rest des dummen Pöbels." {n}Vistenza blickt auf das Vox.{/n} "Zufällig habe ich gehört, wie die Wächter über einen Fremden in dieser Gegend sprachen. Außerdem wissen wir nach wie vor nicht, wer diese Schurken auf das Anwesen gelassen hat – diese Person weiß bestimmt auch etwas."
languages.original_text: "If any of those who attacked the estate had survived, then perhaps they could have been a valuable source of information... but you made an example of them for the rest of the foolish rabble." {n}Vistenza glances at the vox.{/n} "Incidentally, I did overhear the wardens talking about some kind of stranger in the area. Besides that, we still do not know who let those reprobates into the estate — the person who did it might also know something."

traits.locale_text: "Hätte jemand von den Angreifern auf das Anwesen überlebt, wäre das vielleicht eine wertvolle Informationsquelle gewesen ... aber ihr habt an allen ein Exempel statuiert, für den Rest des dummen Pöbels." {n}Vistenza blickt auf das Vox.{/n} "Zufällig habe ich gehört, wie die Wächter über einen Fremden in dieser Gegend sprachen. Außerdem wissen wir nach wie vor nicht, wer diese Schurken auf das Anwesen gelassen hat – diese Person weiß bestimmt auch etwas."

languages.text: « S'il y avait eu des survivants parmi ceux qui ont attaqué le domaine, nous aurions peut-être pu leur tirer de précieuses informations... mais vous avez fait d'eux un exemple pour le reste de la populace. À propos, j'ai entendu les gardiens parler d'un étranger dans le secteur, {n}ajoute Vistenza en jetant un coup d'œil au vox.{/n} De plus, la personne qui a ouvert les portes du domaine à ces dépravés sait sûrement quelque chose, mais nous n'avons pas encore réussi à l'identifier. »
languages.original_text: "If any of those who attacked the estate had survived, then perhaps they could have been a valuable source of information... but you made an example of them for the rest of the foolish rabble." {n}Vistenza glances at the vox.{/n} "Incidentally, I did overhear the wardens talking about some kind of stranger in the area. Besides that, we still do not know who let those reprobates into the estate — the person who did it might also know something."

traits.locale_text: « S'il y avait eu des survivants parmi ceux qui ont attaqué le domaine, nous aurions peut-être pu leur tirer de précieuses informations... mais vous avez fait d'eux un exemple pour le reste de la populace. À propos, j'ai entendu les gardiens parler d'un étranger dans le secteur, {n}ajoute Vistenza en jetant un coup d'œil au vox.{/n} De plus, la personne qui a ouvert les portes du domaine à ces dépravés sait sûrement quelque chose, mais nous n'avons pas encore réussi à l'identifier. »

languages.text: "Konağa saldıranlardan biri bile hayatta kalsa değerli bilgiler verebilirdi ama... Aptal ayaktakımına ibretiâlem ettiniz." {n}Vistenza voksa bakıyor.{/n} "Aklıma gelmişken, dizdarların olay yerinde dolaşan bir yabancı hakkında konuştuklarına kulak misafiri oldum, haberiniz olsun. Ayrıca bu namussuzları konağa kimin soktuğunu da hâlâ bilmiyoruz. Bunu yapan hain de bir şeyler biliyor olabilir."
languages.original_text: "If any of those who attacked the estate had survived, then perhaps they could have been a valuable source of information... but you made an example of them for the rest of the foolish rabble." {n}Vistenza glances at the vox.{/n} "Incidentally, I did overhear the wardens talking about some kind of stranger in the area. Besides that, we still do not know who let those reprobates into the estate — the person who did it might also know something."

traits.locale_text: "Malikâneye saldıranlardan biri bile hayatta kalsa değerli bilgiler verebilirdi ama... Aptal ayaktakımına ibretiâlem ettiniz." {n}Vistenza voksa bakıyor.{/n} "Aklıma gelmişken, muhafızların olay yerinde dolaşan bir yabancı hakkında konuştuklarına kulak misafiri oldum, haberiniz olsun. Ayrıca bu alçakları malikâneye kimin soktuğunu da hâlâ bilmiyoruz. Bu hain de bir şeyler biliyor olabilir."
